description.displayText: There are many things I could say about Donna, but most importantly, we trust her with our three young children.  It was not easy for me to find someone I could say that about.  Donna is an experienced mother and has young grandchildren, so she knows what she is doing!  She is comfortable caring for children when they are sick, and is capable of making day to day decisions that are in their best interest.  My children love Donna, and are very comfortable with her and therefore so are we!  Donna is also VERY punctual.  Happy to discuss further by email or phone.

description.displayText: Donna has been with our family for over 2 years now. She's so great with our daughter's calm, loving and attentive. She's always on time and has never missed a day. We just had our second child and feel lucky to have Donna be a part of his life too. It's not easy to find good care, but we have found it with Donna for sure!
description.originalText: Donna has been with our family for over 2 years now. She's so great with our daughter's calm, loving and attentive. She's always on time and has never missed a day. We just had our second child and feel lucky to have Donna be a part of his life too. It's not easy to find good care, but we have found it with Donna for sure!

description.displayText: Donna has worked for me for almost 3 years. Returning to work after my first daughter was very hard for me but Donna made the transition so much easier.  She was very caring, gentle and loving to my daughter. I honestly felt like I had a second mother and another grandmother for my daughter. She has become part of our family and has stayed on now to help with my second daughter, who has had many feeding issues. Donna has been great with her and very understanding with when she has her tough days. I would highly recommend Donna, she really does treat the children as if they were her own.

description.displayText: Donna worked for me for almost 2 years. She cared for my little girl as if she were her own. It was great peace of mind knowing my child was in good hands. Donna is responsible and loving. Any family would be blessed to have her be part of their lives.
